article: in what government officials on wednesday described as a blow to mexico 's war on drugs , a judge dismissed charges of drug trafficking against the reputed leader of the powerful sinaloa drug cartel and sentenced him instead to six years in jail on lesser offenses .
abstract: judge dismisses stiff charges against reputed drug lord
